fixed

How is this different from using "xyz.openbmc_project.Inventory.Item.*" which is also used in this code?

When is the time to use the above definitions like

```

    dbus::utility::getSubTreePaths(
        pciePath, 1, {},
        [asyncResp, name](const boost::system::error_code& ec,
```

Or

```
    constexpr std::array<std::string_view, 1> interfaces{
        "xyz.openbmc_project.Inventory.Item.PCIeDevice"};
        
    dbus::utility::getSubTreePaths(
        "/xyz/openbmc_project/inventory", 0, interfaces,
        [pcieDeviceId, aResp,
```

I don't know how the pciePath path worked/works. I was not able to run d-bus command.
May be question to Gunner/Ed.

discord discussion this here: 
https://discord.com/channels/775381525260664832/855566794994221117/1086354041778487316

This is separate
Ack
Let's commit this and then do the further refactoring separately.
This comment got lost, oh well. Add if you think it adds value
Done.

Can we name handlePCIeDevicePath() like doAfterGetPCIeDevicePath() instead of handlePCIeDevicePath()
as "handleXXXX()" is used in case via requestRoutes...() like fabric_adapters.hpp?
Current function name looks good.
I am fine with the current name.
Ack
It would be better to name getPCIeDevicePath() as "getValidPCIeDevicePath()" similar to the usage for FabricAdapter - getValidFabricAdapterPath()?
done
Be careful with extra white space lines, makes reviewing harder and makes the git history/git blame harder to understand. Oh well.
why add this check?
Removed the check.

Not sure I love this name because it is doing more than adding the Header.. 
addPCIeDeviceCommonProperties <-- my recommendation
addPCIeDeviceHeaderAndCommonProperties
Oh well. Change if you want.
Changed the name.

While I'm working on MEX drawer, I found out that 'interface' needs to be specified like

```
     constexpr std::array<std::string_view, 1> interfaces{
        "xyz.openbmc_project.Inventory.Item.PCIeDevice"};

        dbus::utility::getDbusObject(
            pcieDevicePath, interfaces,
 ```

This is not related to this commit. I am just doing the refactor of SystemPCIeDevice. 
Without specifying the interface should work too. I made the changes to getPCIeDeviceList
https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/bmcweb/+/61786
Ack
